scripts.start-ui: rimraf web/app/build && cd web/app && npx snowpack dev
scripts.start: npm run start-server & npm run start-ui
scripts.build-ui: cd web/app && node -e "process.env.VERSION = require('fs').readFileSync('../../VERSION', 'utf8').trim(); require('child_process').execSync('yarn build', { stdio: 'inherit', env: process.env })"
scripts.build-bundle: npm run clean && npm run build-ui && mkdir build && powershell -Command "deno run -A --unstable --import-map=./configs/import_map.json ./cmd/moviematch/pkger.ts web/app/build web/template/index.html configs/localization VERSION | Out-File -Encoding utf8 build/pkg.ts" && powershell -Command "(Get-Content configs/import_map.json) -replace 'pkger.ts', 'pkger_release.ts' | Set-Content build/import_map.json" && deno bundle --unstable --lock deps.lock --import-map=build/import_map.json ./cmd/moviematch/main.ts > build/moviematch.js
scripts.build-binary-windows: npm run build-bundle && deno compile --unstable --allow-read --allow-write --allow-env --allow-net --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc --output build/windows-amd64/moviematch build/moviematch.js
scripts.build-binary-linux: npm run build-bundle && deno compile --unstable --allow-read --allow-write --allow-env --allow-net --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu --output build/linux-amd64/moviematch build/moviematch.js
scripts.lint: deno fmt --check --ignore=build,web/app/node_modules,web/app/build && deno lint --ignore=build,web/app && cd web/app && npx tsc
